eventDecorators.name: Initialized
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the receiver of the minted tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens being minted.

parameterDecorators.name: controlledToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token that is being minted.

parameterDecorators.name: referrer
parameterDecorators.description: The address that referred the minting.

functionDecorators.name: beforeTokenTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Called when tokens are transferred or burned.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the sender of the token transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the receiver of the token transfer. Will be the zero address if burning.

parameterDecorators.name: controlledToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token that was transferred.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
